org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.AbstractModel<Elements,D>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.AbstractElement<IsDefaultRectangle>
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultOptionsElement, IsDefaultRectangle

    public class Rectangle
extends AbstractElement<IsDefaultRectangle>
implements IsDefaultRectangle
    Rectangle elements are used to represent the bars in a bar chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
